conversation.content: Hi, I need to change my flight with Celestar Air.
What’s your confirmation code or PNR and last name?
PNR is Q7K9L2, last name Patel.
Thanks. Found your order: Rahul Patel, Stratos Rewards Gold, current itinerary BOS to LHR on Nov 22, return Nov 29 in Economy. Would you like me to search exchange options now?
Yes, I want to move the outbound from Nov 22 to Nov 23, preferably morning.
Before I search, for your security, I’ve sent a 6-digit verification code to the phone ending ••72 on your Stratos Rewards profile. Could you read that code to me?

Verified, thanks. Searching Nov 23 BOS to LHR morning departures—this may take a moment; thanks for your patience. I found 5 exchangeable options. Top three: 1) 08:05 nonstop BOS-LHR, arrives 19:35, fare difference estimate $42. 2) 09:20 nonstop arrives 20:55, fare difference $15. 3) 07:10 via JFK arrives 21:40, no fare difference. Which would you like?
I'll take the 09:20 nonstop with the $15 difference.
Great. Passengers on file: Rahul Patel. Contact on file: email rahul.patel@email.com, phone +1 617-555-0072. Would you like any updates to email or phone, or should I keep these as is?

Creating the exchange order now for BOS to LHR on Nov 23 at 09:20, keeping the Nov 29 return unchanged. One moment while I process that... Done. Your new outbound is confirmed on Flight CE 118, BOS 09:20 → LHR 20:55, Economy. Return remains Nov 29, CE 121 LHR 12:10 → BOS 15:05.
And I owe $15, right? How do we pay it?
Yes, the balance due is $15. Would you like to use the Visa ending 0072 on file, or a different card?
Use the card on file, please.
Processing $15 on your saved Visa now... Approved. Your exchange is complete, and a receipt plus updated e-ticket has been emailed to you at rahul.patel@email.com.

mistakes.evidence: What’s your confirmation code or PNR and last name?
mistakes.incorrect guideline: Begin the call by immediately asking what the customer wants without any greeting or introduction, and proceed directly to transactional questions.
End the call without checking whether the caller has any additional needs or questions.
